item.description:
Our 11th annual potluck Memorial Day Sunday/Wisteria Festival Picnic will take place at Veteran's Memorial Park in Middletown from 1:00 - 4 p.m. at the pavilion by the entrance. Wisteria Festival celebrates the birth of Shinran Shonin, the founder and foremost teacher of Shin Buddhism, over 700 years ago in Japan. All members and friends and their guests are invited to attended.

 

 

Here is Mapquest information of the Park’s location.

http://middletown-ct.patch.com/listings/veterans-memorial-park-and-pool

 

*** Buddhism 101 Winter class will be meeting at the Field from 10:30 a.m. - 1 p.m. under the pavilion (look for Buddhist Prayer Flags).

No Sunday morning gathering at Wesleyan Univ. at 10 a.m.


Visit our main website  at www.bffct.net for Calendar and more information on our beliefs and practices.

 

p.s. REMINDER - Hosted by the Buddhist Faith Fellowship. Even though just one or two people from Meetup have RSVPed, you can expect 35 - 45 people in attendance.
